mapper.select: SELECT p.`bar_code` as bar_code, p.`name` as name, p.`psn` as psn,d.`make_count` as make_count,d.`make_half_count` as make_half_count,d.`back_count` as back_count,d.`remark` as remark,d.make_date as make_date FROM Products p left join DayMakeProducts d on d.bar_code = p.bar_code and d.make_date = (select max(make_date) from DayMakeProducts where bar_code=#{barCode}) WHERE p.bar_code = #{barCode}
